scripts.build:check: npm run clean && npm run -s check:env && next build
scripts.ci:verify: npm run clean && npm run scripts:check && npm run type-check && npm run lint
scripts.terraform:deploy: npm run infra:init && npm run infra:plan && npm run infra:apply
scripts.alexai:ts:heal: bash scripts/maintenance/fix-ts-known-issues.sh && bash scripts/maintenance/fix-ts-rag-memory-never.sh && bash scripts/maintenance/fix-ts-sprint-planning-memories.sh && bash scripts/maintenance/ts-heal-supabase-inserts.sh && rm -rf .next || true && npm run build
scripts.milestone:run: npm run -s secrets:sync && npm run -s check:env && npm run -s milestone
scripts.alexai:ship:prep: npm run -s alexai:git:sanitize && npm run -s scripts:check && npm run -s check:env
scripts.alexai:ship:milestone: npm run -s alexai:ship:prep && npm run -s milestone:run
scripts.alexai:ship:heal: npm run -s alexai:ship:prep && npm run -s alexai:ts:heal
scripts.alexai:ship:all: npm run -s alexai:ship:prep && npm run -s alexai:utf8:fix && npm run -s alexai:ts:heal && npm run -s milestone:run
scripts.alexai:ship:push: npm run -s alexai:ship:all && git add -A && (git commit -m "chore: milestone + docs + build heal" || true) && git push
scripts.deploy: gh workflow run deploy.yml --ref main -f reason="Manual CLI Deployment" && echo 'ðŸš€ Deployment triggered via GitHub Actions. Monitor at: https://github.com/bradygeorgen/rag-refresh-product-factory/actions'
scripts.milestone:deploy: npm run milestone:run && git push && npm run deploy
